programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: The prime suspect in an old murder case comes to the forefront of a new CSI investigation involving the murder of a mother and her child.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: When a popular young singer is found dead outside an infamous Las Vegas nightclub, the team uncovers a link between the present day crime and a murder committed 50 years earlier.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: When a new murder leads to a connection with an infamous serial killer, Grissom secretly joins the class of well-known criminal pathologist Dr. Raymond Langston, to gain access to the killer and crack the case.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: When the CSI team investigates a case involving the world of domination, Grissom pays a visit to Lady Heather to help find some answers.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: The CSI team is shocked and saddened when, after working with Dr. Raymond Langston on the 'Dick & Jane' murders, Grissom announces that his time as a CSI has come to an end and offers Langston a permanent position on the team.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: The first day on the job for Dr. Langston turns from bad to worse when a simple burglary case quickly overlaps with a complicated arson and homicide case.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: When an undercover FBI agent is found brutally murdered, the CSI team is called in to assist the victim's partner in finding the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Doctors don't know why the young scientist is gravely ill. When tests finally reveal the cause, it's too late to save him. Police hope that lab analysis of his hair - showing when attempts were made on his life and what was used - will lead to the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Two eyewitnesses see a truck intentionally drive over a sleeping man outside a motorcycle gang's clubhouse. During the investigation the witnesses, the truck, and the body disappear, leaving police just one clue: a bloodstain in the snow.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a woman is found dead in a ravine, police are stuck, as any evidence was washed away by storms. 20 years after the fact, an old hat and a tiny chip of metal put investigators back on the trail of a case long gone cold.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A house erupts into flames on a winter night, killing one person and injuring another. The survivor blamed a kerosene heater for the fire, but the evidence did not match her story.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1957 the police search for a man who committed several crimes in one night, including murder. Eventually, the case turned cold. Almost fifty years later, with the help of scientific advances, the investigators find their man.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Texas City police fear the work of a serial killer after two young women are found dead in the same field. They have little to go on until a third woman comes forward claiming she's the one who got away.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When new DNA technology becomes available, cold case investigators in Tennessee think they'll finally be able to find out who killed a local college student.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is assaulted and stabbed nearly 30 times by an unknown assailant. Within days police hone in on a suspect who all but admits to the crime. As the trial approaches, DNA test results stun prosecutors and the suspect is released.

programme.title: American Greed: Scams, Scoundrels and Scandals
programme.desc: A trio of Texas conmen scores $100 million, telling investors there's big money in the 'life settlement' insurance business.

programme.title: American Greed: Scams, Scoundrels and Scandals
programme.desc: A charismatic New Mexico real estate broker scams $75 million in a fake land investment program and then pleads his case on TV. With a 30 year career in real estate, many thought broker Doug Vaughan was a man to be trusted.

programme.title: American Greed: Scams, Scoundrels and Scandals
programme.desc: New York City construction workers trusted Melissa King to oversee union benefits to ensure their retirements, but instead Melissa turned around and cut herself checks to the tune of $42 million.

programme.title: American Greed: Scams, Scoundrels and Scandals
programme.desc: Currency traders in Chicago steal 10 million dollars from clients to fund a binge on strippers, clothes and fast cars. Also, a Miami tax advisor steals millions from the people who considered him a best friend.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Just as Horatio and Marisol begin their new life together as husband and wife, the Mala Noche gang trial is disrupted when a witness helps the defendant go free. Meanwhile, a jilted lover from Delko's past wreaks havoc on other women.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and Delko search Miami to bring down the Mal Noche gang once and for all after the murder of someone very close to them. Meanwhile, when the laboratory mole is finally revealed to the entire department, the news sends the remaining CSIs reeling.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: In Rio, Horatio and Delko are close to catching Riaz, Marisol's killer. There, Horatio reunites with Yelina and learns that Raymond may be in too deep working undercover within Riaz's drug ring.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: After collecting the evidence to a crime scene involving a murdered ATF agent who was working undercover, Calleigh is run off the road into a canal, corrupting her evidence.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the team discover that the motive for the murder of a celebrity is tied to a 'death pool,' in which players bet on when famous people are going to die. The CSIs discover that the offshore gaming ship is part of a counterfeiting ring.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A male model is run over by a car and the CSIs discover that his good looks may have cost him his life. Meanwhile, Natalia's abusive ex-husband is released from jail and begins stalking her at the lab.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A local city councilman's body is found in an empty house and the team learns that neighbours were irate that the victim had been backing eminent domain, the government's right to force people out of their homes for private development.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a believer in Santeria, a mix of Catholicism and African voodoo, is found murdered in front of her shrine of animal sacrifices, bizarre incidents start happening around the CSI lab and people start speculating that the lab is cursed.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: During evidence collection at a fatal car accident scene, the CSIs enter the world of 'sideshows,' where kids gather in tricked-out cars, mostly stolen, performing dangerous stunts.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A kidnapping case becomes personal for the CSIs when the victim turns out to be Boa Vista's sister. Now, they must find the killer who has been posing as a photographer to trap unsuspecting women before he strikes again.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a young woman is murdered after being 'auctioned off' at a charity event, Horatio uncovers an even deadlier plot against the city. Horatio soon discovers that the victim was only there to expose the event's host as a dangerous drug dealer.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a marine recruiter is murdered, the team must delve into the world of enlisting soldiers and the families they leave behind in an effort to find the killer. Meanwhile, Natalia must face her ex-husband again when he asks out one of her co-workers.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A suspected terrorist is being tracked down by her own people who fear she may be a traitor. Believing she is innocent, Horatio must find her before she is killed.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When Natalia's ex-husband is murdered, evidence suggests that she killed him. While Natalia remains a suspect, the rest of the team, careful to avoid any suspicion of interference from Internal Affairs, must watch the case from the sidelines.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The bomb squad must deactivate a bomb when Tripp steps on a land mine while investigating a crime scene. Meanwhile, after protecting a woman in the midst of a domestic dispute, Delco is slapped with a $250,000 lawsuit by the wife who set him up.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A truck full of confiscated weapons is hijacked and the weapons are released back into the public. Horatio links the crime to Clavo Cruz, a man he put away for murder years ago. As the team tries to find him, a member of the team is fatally shot.
